Sutherland is lighting up today with clean 5 ft @11s W swell and light SSW winds at 12 mph. Melvich and Strathy are prime spots, with Melvich best from 10:50 to 12:40. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 4 ft @11s W, still offering good conditions at the same spots with SSE winds at 16 mph. Day after, conditions decline as the swell drops to 3 ft @7s WSW, with a fresh SE wind making it poor across the board. Best: today.
